text: Made in Heaven is a 1995 album by Queen. Made in Heaven may also refer to: ==Film and television== * Made in Heaven (1921 film), an American silent film by Victor Schertzinger * Made in Heaven (1952 film), a British comedy by John Paddy Carstairs * Made in Heaven (1987 film), an American romantic comedy by Alan Rudolph * Made in Heaven (TV series), a 2019 Indian web series ==Music== * "Made in Heaven" (song), by Freddie Mercury, 1985; also covered by Queen (1995) * "Made in Heaven", a song by Kylie Minogue, the B-side of "Turn It into Love", 1988 * "Made in Heaven", a song by Nik Kershaw from 15 Minutes, 1999 * Made in Heaven, a 1996 video by Queen ==Other media== * Made in Heaven (Jeff Koons), a 1990–1991 multimedia art series by Jeff Koons * Made in Heaven (manga), a 2007 manga by Ami Sakurai * Made in Heaven, a Stand (supernatural power) in Stone Ocean, the sixth story arc of the Japanese manga series JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
title: Made in Heaven (disambiguation)
